sections.heading: Repealed.Section 22-8A-2 - Repealed
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1999, ch. 281, § 25 repealed 22-8A-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1993, ch. 227, § 1, relating to charter schools, effective June 18, 1999. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1998 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For present comparable provisions,see22-8B-1 NMSA 1978 et seq.
